title: Dallas Buyers Club 2014 720p BluRay x264 SPARKS AFTP
description:
Ron Woodroof (Matthew McConaughey), a drug user, lover of women, homophobic, who in 1986 was diagnosed with AIDS and was sentenced to 30 days of life. From there, his fight for life intensified and, almost on the verge of death, he was in search of alternative medicines out of the country as the only legal remedy in the United States to combat the disease, the time was AZT. With the help of your doctor, dr. Eve Saks (Jennifer Garner) and transvestites Rayon (Jared Leto), HIV positive, Woodroof created clubs where people paid for these alternative treatments, leading pharmaceutical companies in the United States to wage war against him. Woodroof died on September 12, 1992, six years after the fatal diagnosis.
